Little Witch Academia
Little Witch Academia
Oh, if it is not Diana.
Are you doing more research?
You are always so dedicated.
I was reading through the registers, hoping to learn more about Professor Croix.
About Professor Croix?
It appears she was an excellent student.
She garnered acclaim for her magic development despite her young age.
Her thesis on the conversion of magic energy is particularly innovative.
That is right, Diana.
She was a prodigy who could rival even you.
Her unmatched passion for magic was surely inspired by some greater goal she wished to accomplish.
But back then, she gave the impression of a rather reserved person.
Were you personally acquainted with Professor Croix?
Sh-She was famous among all the students.
We were not all that close, but I heard of her exploits often.
OhI should be going now.
Not a quiet minute in the day!
Being a run-of-the-mill teacher sure is demanding...
Ursula... Ursula Callistis...
Her target must be the revived Claiomh Solais.
Croix...
Professor Croix is the best!
Strong, smart, and beautiful!
I have never seen a teacher like her before!
Oh yeah?
Modern magic, was it?
Are not this a pain in the ass?
You are crazythis is the best!
Witches have got to get with the times!
The future is now!
The future, huh...
But then there would be no difference between magic and science.
Thanks to the Sorcery-thingamajig she made, we will be able to use magic even off school grounds!
There is an article on Professor Croix's past here.
New professor Croix Meridies graduated from Luna Nova ten years ago.
Praised as a'prodigy' during her student years due to her exceedingly high marks,
she received various awards, including the Golden Ash Prize and the title of Moonlit Witch.
Moonlit Witch?!
That is just like Chariot!
So Professor Croix was here at the same time as Chariot.
I wonder if they were rivals!
Girls, you should not be playing with those toys here.
Professor, were the two of them rivals?
Not in the slightest.
Croix and Chariot were nowhere near the same level back then.
Croix worked hard and put in the effort to improve her magic.
On the other hand, Chariot's grades were always in the gutter.
I will admit that Chariot had a natural sense for magic.
However, in addition to neglecting her studies,
she even committed the sin of using our sacred magic for her frivolous entertainment shows.
Now the public's got the wrong impression of magic, and her reputation among witches could not be worse.
In stark contrast to her,
Croix was seen as carrying the torch of magic into the future...
This is amazing!
You need to check this out!
The site's got another eyewitness account on it.
No way, it is still flying around?
Just look!
Wow, !
Ladies.
You are forbidden to use computers outside of the classroom.
Okay.
She called it a computer!
To think that she is adopted this magic science nonsense over the last decade...
I could not be more disappointed.
Huh?
Akko?
Professor Croix!
I did not know you were Chariot's upperclassman!
Shiny Chariot!
Yes, I remember her.
She called herself Chariot du Nord back in those days.
She was a charming witch with the ability to attract the attention of everyone around her even as a child.
You are the first person I have heard praise Chariot since I got here, so I am getting a bit emotional.
They all say she went down the wrong path and stuff...
Chariot du Nord loved the sensational and eye-popping kind of magic.
It earned her the scorn of the more orthodox witches.
But I prefer not to be bound by such dated preconceptions.
What she did was meaningful, regardless of the results of her actions.
Professor Croix, you really are the best!
Do you know why Chariot disappeared, or where she is now?
Are you really that interested in her?
I want to meet her so that I can thank her for giving me a dream and changing my life!
If you have anything that might be connected to her, I could try analyzing it with my magic science.
Something connected to her?
Like for example...
The Shiny Rod!
I have Chariot's staff!
I found it in Arcturus Forest!
In Arcturus Forest?
I will go get it!
Hold on, Akko.
I do not have the necessary equipment in this classroom.
Meet me in the New Moon Tower after school.
In the New Moon Tower?
My laboratory is there.
I will be able to analyze it there, your... rod of something.
The Shiny Rod!
I will bring it for sure!
Oh, Professor.
Is Akko here?
She went to the New Moon Tower earlier.
The New Moon Tower?
I think Professor Croix asked her to bring the Shiny Rod or something.
Akko's in danger!
Where is Professor Croix's laboratory?
Will you lead me there?
I brought the Shiny Rod!
Please analyze it!
Put it down there.
I will analyze it.
Oh, sure.
It appears the Shiny Rod reacts to high levels of spirit energy.
What does that mean?
Its magic activates in response to synchronization with the wielder's emotional energy.
So, um...
In the past, it reacted to Chariot's heart.
And now...
And now?
Has the Shiny Rod ever reacted to your emotions?
Y-Yes, it has.
Why does the Shiny Rod react to you,
and what situations because it to activate?
Let me take a look for you.
I want to be like Chariot!
I will become an amazing witch and touch the hearts of people around the world!
A believing heart is my magic!
Personality analysis.
Emotional pattern: yellow.
Predictive ability: zero.
Objectivity: zero.
Traits: impulsive, selfish, pushy, simple, clumsy, carefree.
So you have come, Chariot.

but it seems you have retained a bit more than I had expected.

You have not changed one bit, especially how you want everything for yourself!
You, however, have changed.
You are hardly a shadow of your former self.
To think I was once blinded by your brilliance.
In any case, regardless of what it is that I am plotting, you are powerless to stop me, Chariot.
No, I suppose I should call you Professor Ursula now.
Have you revealed your secret to her?
Even if I can never shine again...
I will protect Akko!
Akko...
Akko...
Professor... Ursula?
Huh?
Was not I in Professor Croix's laboratory?
You started to feel sick, so I brought you back here.
I was... having a dream.
Like Chariot was talking about something...
Reconstruction magic or something...
I have been meaning to speak to you about it eventually.
About the true meaning behind why the Shiny Rod revealed itself to you.
And about the power to change the world inherent in the world reconstruction magic, Grand Triskelion,
and what that magic actually does.
Only the Nine Olde Witches know everything.
The origin of the Grand Triskelion dates back several thousand years.
Back then...
Yggdrasil's branches encompassed the entire world.
Its branches held even the stars and planets in place.
It was from there that witches drew their infinite magic.
But its power withered with time.
Its decline signaled the end of the great age of magic.
Only traces of it remain as what we now call the leylines.
But that original power was passed down in secret.
The Nine Olde Witches sealed it within Arcturus.
That itself is the magic which can reconstruct the world
Grand Triskelion.
Grand Triskelion?
We know that only the revival of the seven Words may break its seal.
Those are the seven Words.
It is written in the Luna script.
I cannot read it at all.
The ancient witches learned it from the moon and stars.
There are hardly any witches who can read it now.
The seven Words have been lost for a long time.
Simply reciting them will not activate it.
Only when the one reciting it breathes life into their revival will the magic be released.
When the one reciting... breathes life into them?
You have already revived three of the Words.
I have?
Do you remember the day you arrived at Luna Nova?
You breathed life into the first Word.
If I reach out, it is sure to begin!
Thrilling and exciting, my very own story!
Noctu... Orfei!
Aude Fraetor!
That was the first Word?
Its meaning is strive for your ideal place.
Those who try to achieve their dreams must go through hardships.
There may come times when you fail and lose sight of that dream.
But you must never let the flame in your chest go out.
Burn that flame bright, and strive for your ideal place.
That is what it means.
Noctu Orfei Aude Fraetor.
The second was at Blue Moon Abyss.
That which is dreamed cannot be grasped.
But work towards it, day after day, and you will find it in your hands!
Phaidoari Afairrynghor.
And the third you recited at the Samhain Festival.
Open your heart!
Let us laugh together!
Arae Aryrha!
You and the Shiny Rod revived the lost Words.
I did?
There are four Words remaining.
Four... what do they mean?
That is for you to learn for yourself.
Do you know them, Professor?
All except for the very last.
When you will have grown by your own power and breathed life into all seven Words,
the seal on the Grand Triskelion will break.
I see... so that is why.
Professor, I finally got it!
Chariot!
Chariot's been searching for the Words!
That must be why she disappeared!
If I keep chasing after the Words too, I know I will run into her!
I will find them!
All seven Words!
